A master student in Software Engineering at University of Kaiserslautern, Germany. I am passionate in software development, design and technology.

This past summer, I worked with Google's Android Graphics Tool team to enhance the graphics shader compilers testing framework GraphicsFuzz under the Google Summer of Code 2019 program.
